message: “It is my firm belief that parents are unaware of the threat that is very much present; very close to their own children,” Litvak said. Trafficking can come from social media, classmates, churches, even authorities in schools, and the greatest target is kids ages 12 to 14 years old.

data.description: Leaders said the biggest obstacle to stop human trafficking is to raise awareness and make sure families understand it’s happening everywhere.
data.title: Upcoming program to educate public on dangers of human trafficking
